name: Medicare
title: A Medical Appointment Booking Front End Website
description: A medicare booking related front end website. Anyone cam book an appointment for myself and family member too. Patient can find solution with our doctor. Also can see blogs that's write by our specialist doctor.
description2: Firebase for Login/ register method and authentication.
React router dom for routing the pages and responsive.
description3: Tailwind css as css library.
React router dom for routing multiple pages
Mobile and Desktop Responsive (semi-responsive)
Use Firebase for creating login and registration
Use Private router it will be redirected after login, if you are not logged in you can't go this type of private pages.
Use royalty free images.
This is a single page react projects.
We make dynamic url

name: Burford Woodcraft
title: A Wood Handicraft React MERN stack Website
description: A wood handicraft related full stack e-commerce website. Two type of people can create an account. Customer and shop owner or admin. Customer can make order and shop owner can upload new product with require details. Everyone has different type of dashboard for best user experience. A customer can also give review and that show in website.
description2: Firebase for login / register method and authentication, tailwind CSS and Material UI as CSS framework, React router dom for routing the pages and it's responsive
Uses React Hook Form and makes an admin panel to manage the website. Besides, in Dashboard normal users and admin will see different options.
For backend it uses Node JS library Express JS, Cors, MongoDB atlas as backend for dynamic data loading and uses react react rating.
description3: Mongodb atlas as backend for data loading.
React hook form for all input form
firebase authentication for creating login and registration
Different dashboard for customer and shop owner
Nodejs(Express.js) for server site.
Material UI and Tailwind css as css library.
React rating for dynamically adding users feedback

name: Great Holidays
title: A Travel Planner Agency full stack website
description: Those people who want to make fun in their life. Those people who want to explore the world. Our website will help them to reach their desire. It's a full stack holiday special website. Website owner can add a new tour destination and tour plan. People who booked a plan they can find their plan in my orders routes. And website owner can see all orders from the people.

React hook form for all input and or select type fields Node JS (Express JS) for server site. MongoDB atlas as backend for data loading.
description3: Tailwind Css as CSS library.
React hook form for all input or select type field.
Firebase for login and security of password.
React router dom for routing the pages.
Mongodb atlas as backend for data loading.
